keyword: how many calories in a corn dog
title: How Many Calories Are in a Corn Dog?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a corn dog, including full nutrition breakdown with carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Corn Dog?
assumptions: Standard frozen corn dog, battered with cornmeal, deep-fried, average size (~113 g), including beef or pork sausage.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, frying method, and ingredients; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard corn dog provides about 260 kcal, with 10 g protein and 30 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use turkey sausage instead of beef/pork

faqs.q: How many calories in a corn dog?
faqs.a: About 260 kcal for a standard one.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a corn dog?
faqs.a: Around 30 g carbs, including 2 g fiber and 7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a corn dog high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 650 mg sodium per corn dog.

faqs.q: How does frying method affect calories in a corn dog?
faqs.a: Deep-frying adds more fat/calories than baking or air-frying.

faqs.q: What's the protein content of a corn dog?
faqs.a: About 10 g protein from the sausage and batter.
